name: 20xRandGOD
description:
Roll a random number between 1 and 999 and slot it into place on a 20 item list. 

Sounds simple but will the RNG be in tune with your gut instincts >:)

  • Both the crank and dpad work for list navigation
  • A places the number in the list and rolls a new number
  • Hold B to reset after a game over, or after placing 1 number
  • Open the menu to see a game over history breakdown

Inspired by a game I saw once on Tiktok

This game is for the Playdate handheld console

I plan on maybe eventually prettying it up a bit with a fresh font and more lively list

Sound effects are used from the open source Pixel Dungeon
